creator: CommunityMatrimony.com
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to ManglikMatrimony, the most trusted matrimony service for Manglik brides and grooms. ManglikMatrimony offers a large number of matches from various Manglik communities amongst Brahmin, Rajput, Kayastha, Khatri, Arora, Agarwal, Maratha, SC, Jat and Yadav communities. You can also find matches from Srivastava, Bisa, Balija/Balija Naidu, Vanniyar, Vadama, Saxena, Mishra, Ambashtha and Zalawadi across the world.

Thousands of brides and grooms from all over the world have successfully found their life partner through us. You too can! The ManglikMatrimony app has lakhs of profiles of different Manglik communities from India and abroad. We understand your personal preferences including community, education, location and profession and offer you suitable matches based on your preferences.

Find brides and grooms by Manglik community

On ManglikMatrimony, you can find profiles from cities such as Delhi, Mumbai, Lucknow, Bangalore, Kolkata, Pune, Chennai, Chandigarh, Ghaziabad and Ludhiana. You can find Manglik brides, grooms from the states of Uttar Pradesh, Delhi, Maharashtra, Punjab, Haryana, West Bengal, Madhya Pradesh, Bihar, Uttaranchal and Tamil Nadu.

Search for NRI Manglik brides and grooms

Find Manglik brides and grooms from NRI communities spread over the globe.

Register FREE on ManglikMatrimony and get these advantages:

• Create your profile for free.
• Set up your partner preferences based on sub caste, age, location and education.
• Get your daily matches on mobile and email basis your preferences.
• View 100% verified profiles and photos of your matches.
• With our advanced filters, find your match by language, education, profession and location.
• Get instant notifications from your matches.
• Express interest to your prospective matches.
• Respond to messages from other members.

Your safety & privacy is our priority

Our “Who Can See Me™” feature allows you complete control of who can see your profile and contact you. You can decide to set various criteria such as age, income, education, community etc., and allow only matches who meet these criteria to view and contact you.


The ManglikMatrimony Premium Membership Benefits:

• Call matches you like and take the conversation forward
• Chat - Connect with matches anytime and anywhere with our secure chat feature.
• Personalised Messaging - You can send personalised messages to members you like.
• Access ManglikMatrimony “Prime” - a membership service that offers government ID-verified profiles.
• Access complete profile information like Educational institute, Company and Horoscope / Kundli.
• Featured Listing - Get Premium Tag and be featured in the premium members section for better visibility & response.


Why ManglikMatrimony is your best choice for finding a life partner

ManglikMatrimony is a part of Matrimony.com Group, the leading matrimony service for Indians worldwide which pioneered online matchmaking in India 21 years ago. Matrimony.com is a public listed company that owns over 300 of India’s largest matrimony brands including BharatMatrimony, MarathiMatrimony, BengaliMatrimony, PunjabiMatrimony, TamilMatrimony, KeralaMatrimony, TeluguMatrimony, KannadaMatrimony and EliteMatrimony.

It has 130 self-owned retail outlets across India and international offices in USA and Dubai.

Matrimony.com has won many awards including:

• The Most Trusted Matrimony Brand (as per the Brand Trust Report 2014 & 2015).
• "The Most Visited Matrimony Portal in the World" by Comscore.

Download the ManglikMatrimony App Now and find your perfect life partner! Register FREE.
